response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and we believe it will be equally valuable to you. Given its significance and rarity, we understand that the asking price might seem substantial at first glance. However, considering the product's worth to you, I am confident that it represents a fair transaction.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1,200,000. This price reflects our desire to make this unique opportunity accessible while ensuring a reasonable profit for us. We are committed to maintaining a mutually beneficial relationship and believe that this offer aligns with our shared interests.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
